text: Oh hey what's up./ I heard you guys came the other day when I wasn't here./ So did I miss like anything./././ important?
Ahh, nothing important./ We're still trying to figure out why this location isn't attracting more customers.
Yeah,/ Skins and Bones showed us their cooking skills. ./././They seem nice!
Hah./ Yeah they DO seem nice.
Yeah!/ ./././Umm,/ wait what?/ ./././I feel like there's something you're not telling me.
Hah hah./ Yeah that's alright,/ you'll figure it out.
Why don't you show us your skills in the kitchen!/ Let's focus on some combos today,/ if you know about those.
